title: come and see
review:
One of the best war films ive ever seen and also the most disturbing one. It shows the threat of the war truly good. Cinematography here was on such an amazing level
Swietnie obrazuje groze i realia wojny.
Prawdziwy, poruszajacy, brutalny. Ukazuje bestialskie zachowania Niemcow w sposob bezposredni. Piekne zdjecia i muzyka.
Arcydzielo.10/10
